intro: Aizoon pruinosum, commonly known as the silverleaf daisy, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It is characterized by its silvery-white, velvety leaves and small, daisy-like yellow flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and thrives in full sun. It is often found in coastal areas and is adapted to arid conditions. Aizoon pruinosum is valued for its ornamental appeal and is sometimes cultivated in gardens.
